sqlMap.select: SELECT * , b.para_name AS credit_level_name , l.link_name , l.link_mobilephone , l.link_telephone , l.link_address , l.link_area FROM T_Cm_Customer a LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Link l ON a.link_id = l.id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Code b ON a.credit_level = b.para_value AND b.para_type = 'customer_credit' where $and{id = #id#} $and{customer_name like '%$customer_name$%'} $and{l.link_name like '%$link_name$%'} $and{credit_level = #credit_level#} $and{customer_type = #customer_type#} $and{emp_id = #emp_id#} $and{link_id = #link_id#} $and{sender_id = #sender_id#} $and{bank_username = #bank_username#} $and{bank_name = #bank_name#} $and{bank_number = #bank_number#} $and{bank_index = #bank_index#} $and{link_name like '%$link_name$%'} $and{link_mobilephone like '%$link_mobilephone$%'} $and{link_address like '%$link_address$%'}
sqlMap.update: update T_Cm_Customer set id=#id# ,customer_name=#customer_name# ,credit_level=#credit_level# ,customer_type=#customer_type# ,emp_id=#emp_id# ,link_id=#link_id# ,sender_id=#sender_id# ,bank_username=#bank_username# ,bank_name=#bank_name# ,bank_number=#bank_number# ,bank_index=#bank_index# WHERE id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM T_Cm_Customer WHERE id IN(#ids#)
